titles.title: Military Installation and Community Lease-Purchase Expansion Act of 2005
A bill to strengthen civil-military relationships by permitting State and local governments to enter into lease purchase agreements with the United States Armed Forces.
Military Installation and Community Lease-Purchase Expansion Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Military Installation and Community Lease-Purchase Expansion Act of 2005 - Authorizes the Secretary of the military department concerned to enter into agreements for the lease-purchase of various facilities owned by the military departments with any eligible entity, including a private person, corporation, firm, partnership, company, or state or local government. (Currently, only private contractors are eligible to enter into such agreements.)
